channel.title: P128 — tiny reviews of tiny games

item.title: MAZE DOG
item.description:
FIND THE CHICKS! DIG FOR SNACKS! ANNOY THE DUCKS! NAVIGATE THE MAZE!

MAZE DOG is a cute little adventure game for 1 player, sporting a seriously rad theme tune and a simple yet fun aesthetic! You go from screen to screen controlling a cute little puppy. You need to find 8 chickens that has run away from their home and theres’ 8 “snacks” hidden throughout the game for completionists. Going from screen to screen can be a little dull sometimes, but finding a chick does feel rewarding. Plus there are a bunch of little details that I enjoy, like pushing bulldogs into puddles or going to the beach to bark at ducks (don’t do it!).

Try MAZE DOG with a steamy cup of java this afternoon.

item.title: DALEK
item.description:
Did you play DALEKS, the old Mac game from the early nineties? It’s ok if you didn’t. In DALEK, a faithful remake, you play as a lone stranger stuck on a huge grid with a bunch of Daleks (the weird villain race from Dr.Who). You can move your stranger in 8 directions and each time you move, the Daleks will move towards you. However, if two Daleks move to a space, they collide and crush each other. The goal of the game is to move your stranger so that all daleks die! EXTERMINATE THE EXTERMINATORS!

The game is quite tricky but charming. I just wish there were more variety as all levels play exactly the same.

item.title: Space Tavern Poker
item.description: I suck at gambling. But I still find poker to be a fun pastime. In Space Tavern Poker you’re stuck on a spaceport, low on space cash. You can take a seat at one of three tables (low, mid, high stakes) to play a hand or two of space poker. The AI-players have a tiny bit of personality, with different names and playing styles. Each player also has a spaceship that they will bet when they’re low on cash. Try to collect them all! Or, like me, sell your own ship so you can play a little more before you go bankrupt. If you want a light-hearted poker experience, you’ll like Space Tavern Poker.

item.title: Plan Bee
item.description:
In Plan Bee you play as a “bee”. A bee is a type of flying insect that plays a super important part of the eco-system. It “pollinates” the flowers by taking “pollen” from one flower to another, helping the flowers create new flowers, ensuring eco-diversity. It is your job as a player to navigate from flower to flower, collecting the pollen. But your bee is dizzy and starving, probably from colony collapse disorder, and will die soon should you fail to find new pollen in time or collapse to the ground!

Plan Bee is a fun little 5 minute high-score single player game, sorta like Flappy Bird.
